Hi Simon,

            How come CQRS, plain vanilla and CQRS + Event Sourcing variants doesn't have the same AggregateRoots design ? 

Thanks.

I experimented a bit with aggregate design. At first it was a little bit different from original DDDSample's but not Vanilla version is 100% compatible (at least I hope so). I haven't upgraded other versions since they are focused on showing possible different routes concerning technology, not domain design. One exception is layered model which is focused on alternative domain model design strengthened by introducing layers.
